'''Kinkaku''' is an event-exclusive NPC that appears in the [[Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival]] event. It is close with [[Ginkaku]] and [[Tetsunosuke]].

===Appearance===
Kinkaku is a golden-colored tanuki with dark brown markings. It has an orange leaf on its head and a green bag tied around its neck.
